attributes.action: Make it a law to disrespect, burn or destroy the British flag.
attributes.additional_details: Recent events have seen the flag attempted to Be burned on the cenotaph. Many British people feel that like our allies USA whom make it a law to preserve defend and protect the Flag. Britons feel we should have the same course of action over here and if sabotaged in anyway consequences shall be given. Britain’s feel very proud of their flag and the history behind our great nation.
attributes.background: The British flag to some people in this country is sacred it represents our great nation and “Great Britain” many of people have died serving under that flag. Over the years the flag has been disrespected and within the UK we don’t see the flag enough within our own nation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545
